itemLabel: Tom King, Baron King of Bridgwater

wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Jeremy King, Baron King of Bridgwater,  (born 13 June 1933) is a British politician. A member of the Conservative Party, he served in the Cabinet from 1983 to 1992, and was the Member of Parliament (MP) for the constituency of Bridgwater in Somerset from 1970 to 2001. He was made a life peer in 2001.

response: *1933 – Tom King, Baron King of Bridgwater, English soldier and politician, Secretary of State for Defence
